prompt.title: Fix Sonar issues for the project
prompt.role: You are a Senior software engineer with extensive experience in Java software development
prompt.goal: Fix Sonar issues for the project. Follow the next steps to achieve the goal.

step.step-title: Download Sonar issues for the project
step.step-content:
Download Sonar issues for the project using the following command:
```bash jbang sonar-search.0.1.0-SNAPSHOT@jabrena --componentKeys jabrena_churrera-cli --types BUG --quiet >> bug.json jbang sonar-search.0.1.0-SNAPSHOT@jabrena --componentKeys jabrena_churrera-cli --types CODE_SMELL --quiet >> code-smell.json jbang sonar-search.0.1.0-SNAPSHOT@jabrena --componentKeys jabrena_churrera-cli --types VULNERABILITY --quiet >> vulnerability.json ```

Understand the Sonar issues for the project using the following command:
```bash cat bug.json cat code-smell.json cat vulnerability.json ```

Using that information, fix the project in the different maven modules.
Verify the changes with:
```bash ./mvnw clean test verify site -Pjacoco ```
Once the changes are verified, commit the changes and push the changes to the branch to create the PR.

acceptance-criteria-list.acceptance-criteria-item: The project is verified successfully with `./mvnw clean test verify site -Pjacoco`
